name: deta.sh-versioned-micro-ts-tests-swagger-validation
description: A deta.sh micro template with typescript, tests, swaggerui api- docs,validation,versioning and different environments.

scripts.setup: npm i && npm run build && npm run detaSetup
scripts.dev:sandbox: ./node_modules/.bin/gulp build && (cd build/sandbox && npm i && ./node_modules/.bin/env-cmd -f .env node devServer.js)
scripts.dev:production: ./node_modules/.bin/gulp build && (cd build/production && npm i && ./node_modules/.bin/env-cmd -f .env node devServer.js)
scripts.deploy:sandbox: npm run test && npm run build:sandbox && npm run detaSetup && ./node_modules/.bin/gulp deploy --env=sandbox
scripts.deploy:production: npm run test && npm run build:production && npm run detaSetup && ./node_modules/.bin/gulp deploy --env=production
scripts.deploy: npm run test && npm run build && npm run detaSetup && ./node_modules/.bin/gulp deploy
